original_title: Talk Talk - Live in Salamanca, Spain 1986
overview: Talk Talk concert in Salamanca (Spain) in 1986. It was recorded at the Plaza Mayor de Salamanca (Salamanca's Main Square) during the XXVI Festival de Radio Cadena Espanola, September 10, 1986. The concert was broadcasted live by TVE.
title: Talk Talk - Live in Salamanca, Spain 1986
